column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Department of Culture and Fine Arts of Phnom Penh said that they have examined and archived some of the archaeological finds unearthed from digging foundations for a new EdC building near Wat Phnom.------The  archeological collections include statues of sandstone and metals and other ceramics. The finds are now being kept in a safe place and technically registered.------The  Ministry informs the public that if they encounter any artifacts
column4: to please contact the Department of Culture and Ministry for examination.
